freenet.clients.http
Interface ToadletContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleToadletServer
public interface ToadletContainer

Interface for toadlet containers. Toadlets should register here.

Method Detail

register

void register(Toadlet t,
              String menu,
              String urlPrefix,
              boolean atFront,
              boolean fullAccessOnly)
Register a Toadlet. All requests whose URL starts with the given prefix will be passed to this toadlet.

Parameters:
atFront - If true, add to front of list (where is checked first), else add to back of list (where is checked last).

publicGatewayMode

boolean publicGatewayMode()
Is public-gateway mode enabled? If so, users with full access will still be able to configure the node etc, but everyone else will not have access to the download queue or anything else that might conceivably result in a DoS.
